mapper.update: update tbl_teacher_subject set tid = #{tid}, subno = #{subno} where tsno = #{tsno}
mapper.select: select tsno, subname, subgrade, tname from (select * from tbl_teacher_subject where tsno in (select tsno from tbl_curriculum ) ) t, tbl_subject s, tbl_teacher a where t.subno = s.subno and t.tid = a.tid order by subname asc, subgrade desc

select p.subname, p.subgrade, t.tname from tbl_teacher t,( select s.subname, s.subgrade, ts.tid from tbl_subject s, ( select subno, tid from tbl_teacher_subject where tsno = #{tsno})ts where ts.subno = s.subno) p where t.tid = p.tid
